summary.purpose: Utility function for merging Tailwind CSS classes with proper conflict resolution
summary.problem_solved: Provides a convenient way to combine CSS classes from clsx and resolve Tailwind CSS conflicts using tailwind-merge

external.name: tailwind-merge
external.why_used: Merges Tailwind CSS classes and resolves conflicting utilities

exports.name: cn
exports.description_one_line: Merges and resolves Tailwind CSS classes with conflict resolution

symbols.name: cn
symbols.description_one_line: Combines class values using clsx and resolves Tailwind CSS conflicts using tailwind-merge

params.name: inputs
params.description: Variable number of class values to merge (strings, arrays, objects, etc)

returns.description: Merged class string with Tailwind conflicts resolved

details.what_it_does: Takes any number of class values, processes them with clsx for conditional compilation, then applies tailwind-merge to resolve any conflicting Tailwind utilities, returning a clean merged class string

minimal_correct.title: Basic class merging

extensive_correct.title: Complex class merging with Tailwind conflict resolution
